summary: Request for a non-blocking shutdown method for the Worker class. This issue was closed as the SDK underwent a rewrite and the request no longer applies to the current implementation.
userImpact: Users needed a non-blocking way to shutdown workers without blocking the calling thread.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite and refresh, making this issue no longer applicable to the current version.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
